snippet: GUBER--Carol. Dear Noah and the extended Guber and Tuttleman families, "Sometimes people leave you halfway thru the woods" and with Carol gone, there is less frivolity, laughter and joy in our respective worlds. This passing wasn't the way it's supposed to happen. No aging, no heads-up, no warning - just suddenly there's no Carol! What an awful loss we have all suffered. We mourn with you and extend our deep felt condolences. Although we are in England, our hearts are with you... and with Carol's soul. Cousins Myrna and Freddie Gershon 1/3
lead_paragraph: GUBER--Carol. Dear Noah and the extended Guber and Tuttleman families, "Sometimes people leave you halfway thru the woods" and with Carol gone, there is less frivolity, laughter and joy in our respective worlds. This passing wasn't the way it's supposed to happen. No aging, no heads-up, no warning - just suddenly there's no Carol! What an awful loss we have all suffered. We mourn with you and extend our deep felt condolences. Although we are in England, our hearts are with you... and with Carol's soul. Cousins Myrna and Freddie Gershon 1/3
